Class MealPanelObserver

java.lang.Object
healthyBites.observers.MealPanelObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
MealObserver, InitialLoadObserver
public class MealPanelObserver extends Object implements MealObserver, InitialLoadObserver
An observer specifically responsible for keeping the meal history displays updated. It implements {MealObserver} interface to receive live updates for newly added meals and {InitialLoadObserver} interface to handle the one-time population of the complete meal history when a user logs in.
Author:
HealthyBites Team

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Meal m, Nutrition n)
      Handles live updates for a single, newly added meal. This method is called by the model whenever a new meal is successfully saved.
      Specified by:
      update in interface MealObserver
      Parameters:
      m - The new Meal object that was added.
      n - The corresponding Nutrition object for the new meal.

    • loadInitialHistory

      public void loadInitialHistory(UserProfile user)
      Handles the one-time fetch and population of the user's entire meal history. This method is triggered by the controller upon successful user login. It clears any existing history from the UI and then loads all meals for the user from the model.
      Specified by:
      loadInitialHistory in interface InitialLoadObserver
      Parameters:
      user - The UserProfile of the logged-in user.
